metadata.title: TwoFifty Consulting - Coworking Consultancy
metadata.description: TwoFifty specializes in coworking consultancy, offering expert guidance on creating and optimizing coworking spaces for organizations across the globe.

hero.title: We teach, advise and build understanding about coworking for organizations across the globe.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.subtitle: We Understand Coworking, Globally.
points: Traveled to 50 cities and visited 500+ coworking spaces from New York to Tokyo. Conversing with over 1000 people.
Made the first Coworking Specific Job Board: Coworkies.
Built the first Coworking Hackathon: Hack Coworking.
Created a future of work and workspaces podcast show: Hot Water.
Wrote and self-published "Around The World in 250 Coworking Spaces", a coffee table book showcasing 250 amazing stories of coworking spaces from all over the world.

bookShowcase.title: Our Book About Coworking
bookShowcase.description: Order "Around the World in 250 Coworking Spaces". A coworking book of carefully curated stories from founders and companies that make coworking happen across the globe.

workshops.title: Presentations & Workshops
workshops.subtitle: The Ways We Make a Difference

presentations.title: Presentations
presentations.subtitle: Around the world of Coworking
presentations.description: Our team traveled across the globe to 50 cities to visit, as of today, more than 500+ coworking spaces. From New York to Tokyo we've explored a vast variety of open work/collaborative spaces talking to more than 1000 coworking‐related people.
presentations.callout: Book a "Coworking Around the World" presentation to learn about the various forms of flex/collaborative workspaces across the globe.

moderate.title: Moderate
moderate.subtitle: Future of Work Panels
moderate.description: **Startup Spaces: Crafting Communities** 'Coworking space', 'campus', 'hub' – whatever you call it, the place a tech startup does business in is likely to be an entirely new breed of office, where entrepreneurs can work, learn and network. What once felt like a workplace is starting to feel (and work) a lot like a community. What's next?

presentations.title: Presentations
presentations.subtitle: Share
presentations.description: Participating at various conferences and private events to share what we've learned along the way of our practice & travels. We've been lucky enough to participate at events such as Coworking Now in Gdansk, Coworking Spain Conference, Cowork Buzz, What Works, Techfestival & others.

educate.title: Educate
educate.subtitle: Learn & Share
educate.description: The world is going through fundamental change. Our research and work into the future of work and work-spaces has been valuable to many people and organizations. We strive to share what we've learned with as many companies and groups to get them started onto their journey into coworking and the future of work-spaces.

hackathon.title: Hackathon
hackathon.subtitle: Innovate by Doing
hackathon.description: We believe in learning by doing. With many of our global partners we organize hands-on workshops and events like hackathons, so everyone can build understanding about the coworking world through project-based activities. Hackathons showcase people's ideas and needs when it comes down to work. Workshops are great for companies who would like to educate their team about the new and emerging type of workspaces.

connect.description: Do you have an event, looking for speakers, co-organizers or people who can help you with content around the future of work and workspaces? Send us a message and let's chat!

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: What We Fight For
mission.mainDescription: Two Fifty Co. was founded as an answer to the question: 'How can we make coworking better?' For many years now, our team has traveled around the world visiting coworking spaces and meeting their peoples, over 1000 at the moment. Over time, organizations began to ask us to teach them about how coworking is done around the globe. While working with clients on specific projects, we constantly asked ourselves how to expand our impact on coworking in general. Our most important advice to coworking spaces has always been to work closely with their members. To stress this point, we started Hack Coworking, an event where members can invent the products and services they need in shared workspaces, providing direct feedback to coworking spaces on what to focus their services on. We also embarked on a journey to create a book with unique content that cannot be found through a simple Google search. In addition to our consulting work, we also build and manage the most popular job board for people passionate about participating in the biggest change to the office as we know it.

values.title: Universal Work
values.description: We see coworking as universal. Our understanding of coworking is that it can have the most profound and positive impact on the way humans live and work.

values.title: Co-Creation and Collaboration
values.description: We do not subscribe to a one-size-fits-all approach to success. Instead, we work closely with our clients to build a shared understanding.

values.title: Integrity & Accountability
values.description: We take our work seriously and expect the same from our clients. We approach our projects with passion and focus on achieving our end goal.

values.title: Exchange of Value
values.description: We believe in relationships based on exchange of value. We strive to build sustainable projects with long-lasting results.

retreats.title: Retreats for Coworking Professionals
retreats.description: The Community Managers Retreat, a 4-day in-person workshop, in the beautiful city of Marrakesh, during which you will be able to strengthen your community knowledge, while learning from other community managers from around Europe.
retreats.resetDescription: The retreat aims at bringing you out of your own daily-environment so you can take a step back and reset and reflect.
retreats.learnDescription: Learn from yourself and from the other participants who will join the retreat. Our daily programming will help you gain some perspective on challenge(s) you might face, while developing solutions on how to solve them as a group.
retreats.connectDescription: Build long-lasting connections with other community managers and become a part of our second cohort!

agenda.title: DAY 1
activities: Tour of coworking Spaces in Marrakesh

agenda.title: DAY 2
activities: Presentation on Community Management for Coworking spaces with Examples
Global Examples and presentation on the career path of a community manager

agenda.title: DAY 3
activities: Presentation on community management with global examples and group discussion.
Workshop session in teams, solve challenges
Team presentations, group discussion and feedback session.

agenda.title: DAY 4
activities: Team presentations, group discussion and feedback session.
Setup agenda for followup online calls to build on the group learning outcomes

retreats.ctaDescription: Book an initial call to learn more about the retreat
retreats.heroDescription: Join us for a transformative journey in the heart of Marrakesh. Our 4-day workshop is designed specifically for community managers who want to deepen their understanding and strengthen their practice.

items: 4 days of intensive learning and sharing

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Learn More About the Founders of TwoFifty.

content.paragraph1: TwoFifty Coworking Consulting was founded by Pauline Roussel and Dimitar Inchev, with a focus on enhancing coworking experiences. Our approach is twofold. We organize practical workshops, presentations, and educational events for a range of organizations. Additionally, we consult with companies operating or aspiring to start coworking spaces, offering support in concept development, organization, team building, and community engagement.
content.paragraph2: Our journey began in 2014. At that time, Pauline managed a 2000 sq/m coworking space in Berlin, and Dimitar was involved in a startup accelerator within that space. This collaboration led to the creation of Coworkies.com, the first job board targeted at coworking spaces. We also hosted the first coworking hackathon in London and authored a book detailing our experiences with over 500 coworking spaces in 50 cities globally.
content.paragraph3: At TwoFifty, we actively organize and participate in coworking-related events. Our goal is to share our knowledge and experiences of coworking practices from around the world. As the workplace continues to evolve, we are dedicated to educating individuals and organizations about the benefits and possibilities of coworking.

meta.title: Expert Coworking Consulting Services | TwoFifty
meta.description: Optimize your flexible workspace operations with TwoFifty's expert coworking consulting services. Specializing in operations, sales, community building, and more.

header.label: BENEFITS
header.title: Key Benefits of Our Coworking Consulting Services
header.description: Discover how our consulting services can transform your workspace into a thriving community hub.

benefits.title: Streamline Processes
benefits.description: We'll analyze your current operational workflow and pinpoint areas for improvement. By optimizing term-structure, administrative tasks, implementing automation, and promoting efficient space utilization, we help you save time for important tasks and run a leaner, more effective operation. The result is a smoother experience for everyone involved — from management to members.

benefits.title: Enhance Team Dynamics
benefits.description: Our Coworking Consulting services don't just focus on physical space; we dive deep into the interpersonal dynamics that make or break a coworking community. Through team-building exercises, collaborative workspace design, and industry-tested approaches, we foster an environment where teams can excel. Boost the collaborative spirit of your workspace and see the team spirit and productivity soar.

benefits.title: Boost Community Engagement
benefits.description: Our belief is that a nurtured and taken care of community is the heart of any successful coworking space. Our Coworking Consulting services include strategies to engage your members through events, workshops, and digital platforms. We create a sense of belonging and interconnectivity that not only retains existing members but also attracts new ones. Elevate your shared workspace from a mere office to a thriving, engaged community.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Workspace?
cta.description: Let's discuss how we can help optimize your coworking space operations and build a stronger community.

expert_services_section.label: EXPERT
expert_services_section.title: Results Driven Expert Coworking Consulting Services
expert_services_section.description: Welcome to TwoFifty, where our Coworking Consulting services are driving forward the future of the modern, flexible workspace. In an era of rapid change and increasing need for adaptability, the coworking sector is witnessing unparalleled growth along with new challenges.

header.label: PROCESS
header.title: How It Works: Your Journey to a Better Coworking Space
header.description: Embarking on a consulting journey with TwoFifty is a straightforward process designed to ensure our common project's success from start to finish. Here's how our Coworking Consulting services work in four simple steps:

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: Start by scheduling a free initial consultation with our Coworking Consulting Team. During this session, we'll assess your needs, discuss your vision, and identify the key areas that could benefit from our specialized services.

steps.title: Customized Plan Creation
steps.description: Based on our initial discussion, we develop a customized consulting plan tailored to your unique challenges and objectives. This includes recommended changes, a project timeline, and an estimated budget to provide a clear roadmap for the journey ahead.

steps.title: Implementation and Training
steps.description: The next step in our Coworking Consulting service involves putting the plan into action. From optimizing operational processes to redesigning workspace layouts, we oversee each aspect, ensuring it aligns with our sustainability and adaptability guidelines. We also provide training sessions to educate your team on best practices and new systems.

steps.title: Post-Project Evaluation and Support
steps.description: Our commitment doesn't end with project completion. We conduct a thorough post-project evaluation to measure success and identify any areas for further improvement. You'll also have access to ongoing support and updates to ensure your coworking space continues to flourish.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Take the first step towards optimizing your coworking space. Schedule a free consultation or send us an inquiry.

header.label: FOCUS
header.title: Our Approach to Coworking Consulting
header.description: At TwoFifty, we've developed an in-house comprehensive consulting methodology that ensures your coworking space isn't just another office but a dynamic environment where productivity and community thrive. Below, we detail the pillars of our approach.

focus_areas.title: Sustainable Coworking Solutions
focus_areas.description: Sustainability isn't just an environmental concern; it's a business imperative. Our Coworking Consulting services employ cutting-edge practices to ensure your workspace is both environmentally friendly and economically viable. From energy-efficient designs to waste-reducing processes, we guide you in making sustainable choices that benefit your bottom line.

focus_areas.title: Adaptable Workspace Strategies
focus_areas.description: Change is the only constant in today's fast-paced world. Our adaptable workspace strategies focus on creating coworking spaces that can evolve with your needs. Whether you're expanding, pivoting, or adopting new technologies, our Coworking Consulting services build your knowledge to adapt quickly and efficiently.

focus_areas.title: Process Optimization for Operational Excellence
focus_areas.description: Every minute counts in a busy coworking environment. That's why our Coworking Consulting approach involves an in-depth analysis of your current operations. We identify bottlenecks, suggest improvements, and help implement changes that streamline processes, ultimately enhancing productivity and member satisfaction.

focus_areas.title: Community-Centric Planning
focus_areas.description: A coworking space is as strong as the community it nurtures. Our Coworking Consulting services include community-centric planning to ensure that both individuals and teams find value, engagement, and a sense of belonging in your space. From community events to shared goals, we help you build a space that fosters collaboration and mutual growth.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Workspace?
cta.description: Let's discuss how our expert approach can help optimize your coworking space operations.

faq_section.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Coworking Consulting
faq_section.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about our Coworking Consulting services. This FAQ section addresses common queries to ensure you have a clear understanding of our consulting process.

faqs.question: What Makes TwoFifty's Coworking Consulting Unique?
faqs.answer: Our Coworking Consulting services stand out for their focus on sustainability, adaptability, and community engagement. We don't offer one-size-fits-all solutions; instead, we tailor our consulting to meet the unique needs and objectives of each client.

faqs.question: How Does the Initial Consultation Work?
faqs.answer: The initial consultation is a free session where we discuss your needs, assess your current workspace, and identify key areas for improvement. This sets the foundation for our customized Coworking Consulting plan tailored to your goals.

faqs.question: What is Included in the Customized Plan?
faqs.answer: Our customized Coworking Consulting plan includes a range of services like space optimization, process streamlining, team dynamics enhancement, and community engagement strategies. Each plan comes with a clear timeline and estimated budget.

faqs.question: How Long Does a Typical Consulting Project Take?
faqs.answer: The duration of our Coworking Consulting projects varies depending on the scope and specific needs of the client. However, you can expect a project timeline to be discussed and agreed upon during the initial consultation.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Training for Teams?
faqs.answer: Yes, training is a crucial part of our Coworking Consulting services. We provide comprehensive training sessions to educate your team on new systems, best practices, and how to maintain an engaging, productive workspace.

faqs.question: How Do You Ensure Sustainability in Coworking Spaces?
faqs.answer: Sustainability is a core focus of our Coworking Consulting. We guide you in making eco-friendly choices from energy-efficient designs to waste-reducing processes, all aimed at creating a workspace that is both environmentally and economically sustainable.

cta_section.title: Ready to Transform Your Workspace?
cta_section.description: Schedule an initial consultation with our team to discuss how we can help optimize your coworking space operations.
